list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove redundant comments and improve environment variable usage
Cleaned up unnecessary or redundant comments across the codebase for better maintainability and readability. Improved environment variable handling by standardizing usage with `dotenv`. Updated Docker-related files for compatibility with dynamic ports and Cloud Run configurations, and added `.dockerignore` for better file management.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "DefaultHtmlFileTemplate": "HTML File", "Django Server.OrderFlow.executor": "Run", "Docker.Dockerfile.executor": "Run", "Docker.docker-compose.yml: Compose Deployment.executor": "Run", "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-Database detector": "Database detector", "Notification.DoNotAsk-Database detector": "true", "RunOnceActivity.OpenDjangoStructureViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "django.template.preview.state": "SHOW_EDITOR", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "last_opened_file_path": "/Users/myk/PycharmProjects/OrderFlow", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "ml.llm.AIAssistantPromptsLibrary", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
Add Docker support with Dockerfile and docker-compose setup
This commit introduces a Dockerfile and a docker-compose.yml to containerize the application, enabling easier deployment and local development. Additionally, database configuration was updated to use PostgreSQL, and environment variables were integrated for sensitive settings such as the secret key and Telegram bot token.

Remove redundant comments and improve environment variable usage
Cleaned up unnecessary or redundant comments across the codebase for better maintainability and readability. Improved environment variable handling by standardizing usage with `dotenv`. Updated Docker-related files for compatibility with dynamic ports and Cloud Run configurations, and added `.dockerignore` for better file management.

MESSAGE.value:
Add Docker support with Dockerfile and docker-compose setup
This commit introduces a Dockerfile and a docker-compose.yml to containerize the application, enabling easier deployment and local development. Additionally, database configuration was updated to use PostgreSQL, and environment variables were integrated for sensitive settings such as the secret key and Telegram bot token.

Remove redundant comments and improve environment variable usage
Cleaned up unnecessary or redundant comments across the codebase for better maintainability and readability. Improved environment variable handling by standardizing usage with `dotenv`. Updated Docker-related files for compatibility with dynamic ports and Cloud Run configurations, and added `.dockerignore` for better file management.
